channel.title: World of runecraft #317
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Mod lock please, I quit this development.[/size]
[s]World of RuneCraft is a highly edited Delta-based server. I am spending more time on this server than my other ones (Which seem'd to be quite bad). More information comes later.
[b][u][i]Features[/i][/u][/b]
red = not started yellow = working on green = finished
[u][i][b]combat:[/b][/i][/u] Sounds Special attacks Perfected range GFX for some weps perfected magic
[b][i][u]General:[/u][/i][/b] Removal of needless customs Removal of new models for whip and greataxe
And much more. Pics show most of it.
[u][i][b]Pics:[/b][/i][/u] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-07-02-73.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-06-43-54.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-05-40-64.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-05-47-62.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-04-04-23.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-05-03-83.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-05-11-87.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-03-20-65.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1817-02-44-17.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1816-55-08-92.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1816-46-18-01.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1816-33-53-69.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/javaw2010-11-1816-32-13-34.jpg[/img]
Updates 20-Nov-2010 [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-29-36-21.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-28-11-21.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-27-32-07.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-27-15-71.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-26-20-82.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-25-53-71.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-23-55-51.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-23-18-40.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-23-00-50.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-21-52-17.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-2023-22-00-31.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h357/worldofrunecraft/Updates%2020-Nov%202010/javaw2010-11-1915-58-14-76.jpg[/img]
I'm updationg this topic as I add more stuff and goals.
If I added anything thats shudnt be in this section, tell me and I will remove.
Credits: Delta Me[/s]

[quote=“zyle1992, post:41, topic:369332”]And they got the idea for the name from where… World of Warcraft.[/quote] Yes, well I do not know where they got the name… But W/E I quit this development. I am gnna start over with P.I. Happy now?

item.title: World of runecraft #317
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

zyle1992:

Alright, let’s get some things straight right now. All those features have existed in EVERY server since, '07-'08, if not earlier. The name IS a play on “World of Warcraft”. If you insist on including the server revision in the name, don’t make it look like another version(ie. you call it a 317, when visually it’s more post 474). Edgeville/Camelot/Falador/Varrock/etc. have been the home locations since RSPS development began. Delta was a shit server to begin with, and anyone who insists on “developing” a Delta server should quit now. Now this one is more of a personal opinion, but custom items, objects, npcs, interfaces, etc that are added to the client are only added to, for instance, make a 317 server more like a 508. That’s not how things should be. If you want a 508 server, use a 508 client, and a 508 server, using the 508 protocol.

Yes, well this is in beta. I am changing the home later, in the full version.
Yes, I know there is a game called world of warcraft. But that game is not why I called my server WoR. It is cause some1 suggested it and I had no better ideas.

[quote=“uncalled”]Yes it is, but a coded Delta vs. a coded PI; there’s no match there.
Sorta like a 17 year old fighting a 1st grader, PI wins no doubt.

If you don’t move on from Delta, you’ll never learn anything.[/quote]

Yes, I will move on from Delta, later. At the moment I will just host Deltas. PI will be my next step.

Read full topic

item.title: World of runecraft #317
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Alright, let’s get some things straight right now. All those features have existed in EVERY server since, '07-'08, if not earlier. The name IS a play on “World of Warcraft”. If you insist on including the server revision in the name, don’t make it look like another version(ie. you call it a 317, when visually it’s more post 474). Edgeville/Camelot/Falador/Varrock/etc. have been the home locations since RSPS development began. Delta was a shit server to begin with, and anyone who insists on “developing” a Delta server should quit now. Now this one is more of a personal opinion, but custom items, objects, npcs, interfaces, etc that are added to the client are only added to, for instance, make a 317 server more like a 508. That’s not how things should be. If you want a 508 server, use a 508 client, and a 508 server, using the 508 protocol.

Read full topic

item.title: World of runecraft #317
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

adrian1372:

A coded delta is better than a leeched PI.

Yes it is, but a coded Delta vs. a coded PI; there’s no match there.
Sorta like a 17 year old fighting a 1st grader, PI wins no doubt.

If you don’t move on from Delta, you’ll never learn anything.

Read full topic

item.title: World of runecraft #317
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“Mishroom, post:35, topic:369332”][quote author=adrian1372 link=topic=465467.msg3403867#msg3403867 date=1290182871]
I’ll tell u what I changed:
I added sounds. Will post proof soon.
I added the correct emotes for stuff.
I got new interfaces. U just havent seen all of them.
I have new models.
I have added special attack sounds. (Only working in pvp atm. =)
I have edge as home… not falador
I have new shops
And much more…
[/quote]

Sorry, but all you need to do to add sounds is follow a very simple tutorial.[/quote]

Yes, well still… I have only seen 2 servers ever that have sounds. So sounds are pretty unique. I only no bout 1 server thats still online that has sounds. (459+ not included) Which is Grinderscape.

Read full topic

item.title: World of runecraft #317
item.dc:creator: @SunSpec221 SunSpec221
item.description:
@SunSpec221 wrote:

God... Atleast I dnt mean it to be a rip of world of warcraft.... And the dialogues are not meant to be PERFECT like something... lets say Canownueasy can make... DUDE I am not as good as Canownueasy, Soul, wolf and all those pro's

And well, by perfect I mean it is like perfectly working. Not that it is 100% fixed from bugs and wrong stuff.

And… Stop flaming me for using delta. Yes, someone actually did… Delta is what I have most experience in. A coded delta is better than a leeched PI. I bet many agree at that?

I agree. Atleast coding a server is better then leeching from other people. I bet that people do that and change name and add 1 or 2 new models.

I’d love to play this server after it is finished

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: World of runecraft #317
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:31, topic:369332”][quote author=adrian1372 link=topic=465467.msg3405641#msg3405641 date=1290291056]

And perfect dialogues

That statement is wrong, just look at the picture you posted.

You got alot of work to do before anybody will consider this server of yours a success.

God… I have other coders… I didnt code the Barrows, they did

And for all you who discuss my server’s name… It is not my idea to use it… A friend told me to use it. AND it is NOT named after world of warcraft.

AND I have made like 40 updates after I made this topic. I just didnt care to post them, as that will bring in more flame.
[/quote]

All I am saying is that if you don’ t have something perfect, then don’ t say it is. And I am having a hard time understanding how the name “world of runecraft” wasn’ t somehow influenced by world of warcraft.[/quote]

God… Atleast I dnt mean it to be a rip of world of warcraft… And the dialogues are not meant to be PERFECT like something… lets say Canownueasy can make… DUDE I am not as good as Canownueasy, Soul, wolf and all those pro’s

And well, by perfect I mean it is like perfectly working. Not that it is 100% fixed from bugs and wrong stuff.

And… Stop flaming me for using delta. Yes, someone actually did… Delta is what I have most experience in. A coded delta is better than a leeched PI. I bet many agree at that?

Read full topic
